caption: A melancholic indie rock track with tremolo guitars, steady bass, and vulnerable male vocals. The production features atmospheric reverb, subtle keyboard textures, and a slow-building arrangement that captures bittersweet nostalgia.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Polaroid pictures on the wall
Reminders of before the fall
Your handwriting on a note
Words you carefully wrote

[Verse 2]
The apartment still smells like you
Morning coffee for two
Now I drink alone and stare
At your empty chair

[Chorus]
Ghosts of summer haunt these halls
Echoes bouncing off the walls
I'm still here where you left me
Waiting for a memory

[Verse 3]
Your books still line the shelf
I can't move them myself
It would mean that you're really gone
So I just carry on

[Chorus]
Ghosts of summer haunt these halls
Echoes bouncing off the walls
I'm still here where you left me
Waiting for a memory

[Bridge]
Maybe time will ease this ache
Maybe hearts are meant to break

[Outro]
Ghosts of summer
Ghosts of you
